channel.title: Breaking Bit
channel.description: Breaking Bit features the latest happenings from the new Metaverse Studios, Los Angeles. Welcome!

item.title: Breaking Bit
item.description: Metaverse Studios on the stellar network. Trading sym: "MVRS" explorer/stellar.expert

item.title: Space Port
item.description:
Developing a space colony is an ambitious undertaking, but it is one that could pay huge dividends for humanity.
Space Port "SPACEPORT" on the stellar network is planning to partner and dev a new metaverse portal giving access to new private space colony dev in the milky way galaxy. Trading Markets SPACEPORT/SPACE1 #commercial #space #breaking #bit #future #bounty

item.title: Space1
item.description:
Colonizing space not only would someday provide a new home for those who choose to live there, but it could also help us to learn more about our place in the universe and better ways to care for our own planet. a space colony could be an incredible boon for all of us.
"The Metaverse is an online virtual world that allows users to interact with each other in a variety of ways" and will now allow us to peer into new space civilization dev and colonization (a positive in the quest column of type I Kardashev scale dev and potential pioneering member for type II civilization in it's on right) with dev by Metaverse Studios (Los Angeles) and SPACE1. Trading Markets
MVRS/SPACE1. #commercial #space #breaking #bit #future #bounty

item.title: Metaverse Studios Hypermedia
item.description:
Metaverse Studios and the hypermedia protocol. The InterPlanetary File System (IPFS) is a protocol, hypermedia and file sharing peer-to-peer network for storing and sharing data in a distributed file system. IPFS is built around a decentralized system
#goldilocks #zone #sapient #signals #third #millenium #periodization #digitalage #hypermedia #earthstation to #IPFS #pod #contact @Metaverse_StudiosBot

item.title: Breaking Bit
item.description:
Metaverse Studios, a bona-fide new 1.0 movie studio based in Century City one of the most prominent employment centers in the Los Angeles metropolitan area. Neighboring Century City are Beverly Hills to the east, Cheviot Hills to the south, West Los Angeles to the west, and Westwood to the north, and business sister city to Hollywood. Metaverse studios is at the former great backlot of 20th Century studios and, has released it's initial info site and cryptocurrency, "Metaverse Studios" for web3.
#new #goldenage #third #millenium #periodization #digitalage #pod #contact @Metaverse_StudiosBot

item.title: Breaking Bit
item.description: Metaverse Studios reflection: We are on track in the third millennium to have custom-built AI assistants for every human being on Earth by 2029. We are building a new kind of world that will eventually include a new kind of web. The Metaverse -- the combination of AI with the real world -- is one of the two most important technology trends in the world. #new #goldenage #third #millenium #studio #periodization #digitalage #pod #contact @Metaverse_StudiosBot

item.title: Breaking Bit
item.description:
Metaverse Studios reflection: The Metaverse will be a collective virtual shared space, created by the convergence of virtually enhanced physical reality and physically persistent virtual space, including the sum of all virtual worlds, augmented reality, and the internet.
#new #VR #AR #third #millenium #periodization #digitalage #collective #pod #contact @Metaverse_StudiosBot

item.title: Breaking Bit
item.description:
Breaking Bit adds Media RSS (MRSS) to it's capabilities for syndicating, multimedia files (audio, video, image) in RSS feeds.
Breaking Bit MRSS can encompass podcasting, utilizing the RSS format for delivering content to media-playing devices, as well as Smart TVs. Media RSS allows for a much more detailed description of the content to be delivered to subscribers than the RSS standard. #new #Hollywood #California #media #Darling #metaverse #studios #third #millenium #digitalage #AI #community #emissions #views #collective #Europe #Americas #USA #Chatsworth #Pixel #NEWS #podcasts #RSS #Broadcast #official #HollywoodStudios #IPFS #Breaking #Bit #contact @Metaverse_StudiosBot
